          <title>
            <string language="en">Kundt's dust tube</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Staubgefäß Kundts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tube de la poussière de Kundt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tubo da poeira de Kundt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tubo della polvere del Kundt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σωλήνας σκόνης Kundt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tubo del polvo de Kundt</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows Kundt's dust tube set-up used to measure the wavelength of sound.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dust tube</string>
          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die 
Staub-Gefäßinstallation Kundts, die verwendet wird, um die 
Wellenlänge des Tones zu messen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'installation de tube 
de la poussière de Kundt employée pour mesurer la longueur d'onde du
bruit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a instalação do tubo da
poeira de Kundt usada medir o wavelength do som.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la messa a punto del 
tubo della polvere del Kundt usata per misurare la lunghezza d'onda 
del suono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει οργάνωση σωλήνων σκόνης 
Kundt που χρησιμοποιείται για να μετρήσει το μήκος κύματος του 
ήχου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la disposición del 
tubo del polvo de Kundt usada para medir la longitud de onda del 
sonido.</string>
          </description>
